link_desc:
DBforBIX is the first integrated solution for monitoring the most used databases.

DBforBIX arises from the need to integrate all born of Orabbix’s fork.

Now all the SmartMarmot product are resumed into a single fully integrated *BIX solution.

DBforBIX can enquiry:

Oracle

MySQL

PostgreSQL

DB2 (not tested, it can be unstable)

MS SQL Server (not tested, it can be unstable)

Finally now one demon has the ability to monitor all the databases that can be found in a heterogeneous environment.

DBforBIX still remain superscalar and multi thread.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Java|Database Monitor|Custom Script|Other
author: Andrea Dalle Vacche
